name: Bryan Lee
coverLetter: I have been Growing and working in Gardens for over 8 years now and am looking for a place where I can be utilized for my skills.I have trimmed at all levels and have run Trim Pro's and preferably Twister machines. I can deleaf,buck or run the machines. I prefer hand work after product has hung dried on the stalk..I can trim 2-3 lbs in a 10 hr period with minimal breaks. I dont smoke cigarettes and do-not smoke cannabis while working. I am 47, educated and bring no Drama. I am avl to work anywhere in Oregon or Clifornia, I can make my own accomodations or can stay on site and work continually till Job or Season Ends, thank you for checcking out my Resume...Bryan
contact: please contact me at bryantracy7162yahoo.com or send me a message at 530-227-3163
